text: The Ladies' Home Journal is an American women's magazine that is published through Meredith Corporation. The magazine first appeared in February 1883, and went on to eventually become one of the leading women's magazines in the United States during the 20th century. LHJ hit 1 million subscribers around 1907. It went quarterly in 2014. Category:American women's magazines Category:Monthly magazines Category:Fashion magazines
title: Ladies' Home Journal
